issue.title: [CI] Add descriptions to the docker-compose images
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8697](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8697). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add docstring like descriptions to the docker-compose services.
